document.full_text: andy murray has done remarkably well to get anywhere near rafa nadal, roger federer and novak djokovic in recent grand slams but if the briton is to turn the terrific trio into a quartet he needs to do something radical.
document.title: beaten murray needs new tricks to succeed in slams
lines_and_colors: andy murray has done remarkably well to get anywhere near rafa nadal, roger federer and novak djokovic in recent grand slams but if the briton is to turn the terrific trio into a quartet he needs to do something radical.
